Generation V.Black: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
Generation V.White: Highly aggressive, it uses the claws near its neck to dig into its opponents and poison them.
Generation V.Black 2: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
Generation V.White 2: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.

Generation VI.X: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
Generation VI.Y: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

Generation VIII.Sword: Scolipede latches on to its prey with the claws on its neck before slamming them into the ground and jabbing them with its claw's toxic spikes.
Generation VIII.Shield: Scolipede engage in fierce territorial battles with Centiskorch . At the end of one of these battles, the victor makes a meal of the loser.

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Forest of Focus ( Wanderer ) Fields of Honor , Soothing Wetlands , Forest of Focus , Training Lowlands , Workout Sea , Stepping-Stone Sea ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )
